A short description of the export rules.

bool.description: Specifies if the Export rules are enabled or not.

list.description: List of Alarm types to exclude.
List of Alarm types to include. Set it to '*' to include all alarms.
List of namespaces to include alarms from. Omit to include all namespaces.

list.description:
Fields to export from the EDB table set in Path.
Exports all fields if not specified.

string.description: Export mode.

The EDB path to export, in the format '.node.srl.interface'.
Should NOT include the namespace path element.
Export period. Applicable when mode is set to 'periodic' or 'both'.
A where clause to use for the query, e.g. 'oper-state = down'. You can omit enclosing parentheses.

list_nested.description: Defines a custom query as export source

string.description: The resource group.
The resource kind.
The resource name to export. Omit to export all resources based on their GVK

string.description: name of the ClusterServer
resource content will be returned as it was at the time of this git hash

int64.description: Sets number of points sent in single request.

string.description:
Secret containing InfluxDB credentials.
the secret must include a username and password keys or a token key.
Sets the write buffer flush timer.
InfluxDB Organization
Sets the timestamp precision to use in writes for timestamp.
Path to a certificate authority file.
The client certificate file location.
The client private key location.

bool.description: If true the client will not verify the server's certificate.

single_nested.description: Certificates files.

string.description: Secret name containing a ca.crt, a tls.crt and a tls.key keys.

single_nested.description:
Secret containing a `tls.crt`, a `tls.key` and a `ca.crt` keys.
Both `tls.crt` and `tls.key` must be present. If `ca.crt` is not present
the remote server certificate is not verified.
Enable TLS.

string.description: InfluxDB server URL

bool.description: When true, the exporter uses GZIP compression in write requests.

single_nested.description: ClusterServerSpec defines the desired state of ClusterServer

bool.description: Specifies if the client is connected to the InfluxDB server

string.description: Error value if the client is not connected
Last time the connection was checked

single_nested.description: ClusterServerStatus defines the observed state of ClusterServer

an EQL "where" expression that will be used to filter the set of resources returned.
a label selector string to filter the results based on CR labels
